result.execSummary:
The defendant Patrick A Edwards was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Defendant is to submit a DNA Sample.

records.addlTxt:
2:20 p.m.  Defendant present in court with Atty Matt Goldin.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Court recites agreement - defendant will plea to count 1 & 3 in 2016CT18 and count  in 2016CM161.  State concurs.  Defendnat concurs.

Court goes over plea questionnaire with the defendant.  Court goes over constitutional rights with the defendant - defendant waives these rights.  Court goes over the elements of each offense.  Court instructs defendant of the maximum penalty.  Court instructs defendant regarding deportation.

Defendant enters a plea of NO CONTEST.  Court finds the plea is made freely, voluntarily, intelligently and understandingly.  Court finds there is a factual basis to support the plea.  Court finds the defendant guilty on count 1 as charged in 2016CM161 and finds the defendant guilty as charged on counts 1 & 3 in 2016CT18 and orders count 2 be dismissed outright and orders count 4 be dismissed and read-in.  Court orders the judgment of conviction be entered here today.  Sentencing statement by DA.  Sentencing statement by Atty Goldin.  No statement by the defendant.

Court sentences the defendant to:

2016CT18

Count 1

-50 days county jail, concurrent to any other sentence.  Court grants huber, out of county service and out of county travel.
-$650 fine plus court costs.  Court grants the defendant 60 days to pay or payment plan.
-Blood Draw Fee - $42.50
-DL revocation - 27 months
-IID - 27 months
-AODA(GL)
-Defendant is to submit a DNA Sample.

Count 3

-$100 fine plus court costs.  Court grants the defendant 60 days to pay or payment plan.
-Defendant is to submit a DNA Sample.

2016CM161

-10 days county jail, concurrent to any other sentence and to commence immediately.  Huber, out of county service and out of county travel.
-Court costs.  Court grants the defendant 60 days to pay or payment plan.
-Defendant is to submit a DNA Sample.

-Sentence is to commence immediately.  Court remands the defendant to the custody of the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department.

-12 hours of credit on OWI arrest.

Court adjourned at 2:30 p.m.
Plea/sentencing hearing on September 19, 2017 at 02:00 pm.

2:17 p.m.  No appearance by the defendant.  Attorney Matthew Goldin present.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Statement by Atty Goldin - have a written authorization on file.  Court sets for plea & Sentencing on September 19, 2017 at 2:00 p.m.  Mandatory appearance.

Court adjourned at 2:18 p.m.
Plea/sentencing hearing on August 15, 2017 at 02:00 pm.

3:39 p.m.  Defendant present in court with Atty Matt Goldin.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Statement by the Court motions have been filed by the State, but not defense.  Statement by Atty Goldin - a resolution has been reached and requests a plea & sentencing be scheduled.  Court sets for plea & sentencing on August 15, 2017 at 2:00 p.m.

Court adjourned at 3:41 p.m.

Statement by Atty Goldin - have been discussion on these cases but no resolution at this time.  Court will set for Status Hearing on June 20, 2017 at 3:30 p.m.  All motions and witness lists are to be filed by June 19, 2017. 

Court adjourned at 1:50 p.m.
Plea/sentencing hearing on May 23, 2017 at 01:30 pm.

2:29 P.M.  Defendant present in court with Atty Matt Goldin.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Statement by Atty Goldin - have had discussions on this matter and requests a plea & sentencing be scheduled.  Court sets for plea & sentencing on May 23, 2017 at 1:30 P.M.. 

Court adjourned at 2:30 p.m.

Court adjourned at 11:15 a.m.
Status hearing on February 14, 2017 at 10:30 am.

10:38 a.m.  Defendant present in court with Atty Matt Goldin.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Statement by Atty Goldin - have held discussions and is not resolved at this time. Court sets for Status Hearing on February 14, 2017 at 10:30 A.M. 

Court adjourned at 10:40 a.m.

10:21 A.M.  Defendant present in court with Atty Joey Roeth.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Statement by Atty Roeth - defendant has retained Atty Matthew Goldin on these cases.  Court sets for Status Hearing on December 12, 2016 at 10:30 a.m.

Court adjourned at 10:23 a.m.
State's
Plea/sentencing hearing on November 1, 2016 at 10:00 am.

11:17 a.m.  Defendant present in court with Atty Joey Roeth.  Lisa Vanden Branden for the State of Wisconsin.  Statement by Atty Roeth - have offers in both cases but still in discussions.  Court sets for plea & sentencing on November 1, 2016 at 10:00 a.m.

By Atty Joey Roeth
Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department.
Status hearing on August 15, 2016 at 10:30 am.
Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department.

8:57 a.m. Defendant present in court without counsel.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant confirms receipt of the criminal complaint and waives reading.  Court instructs the defendant of the maximum penalty on each count.  Court finds probable cause.  Court instructs the defendant of his/her right to an attorney.  Defendant enters a plea of NOT GUILTY.  DA makes bond recommendation.  Court sets bond at $500.00 signature bond and conditions of:  Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department.  Court will set for Status Hearing on August 15, 2016 at 10:30 a.m.
